column_description: A unique identifier for each detention record
A code representing the type of detention (e.g., Lunch, After School, Break, Illness), linked to the Ref_Detention_Type table
The identifier of the student who received the detention, linked to the Students table
The date and time when the detention period begins
The date and time when the detention period ends
A brief summary or description of the detention, if available
Any additional details related to the detention, if available
